nodes.documentation:
@title Fund
@dev Charity app that administers a single fund
nodes.name: Fund

typeDescriptions.typeString: struct Fund.Milestones storage ref[] storage ref

nodes.documentation:
@dev checks that the current milestone is passed.
A milestone is passed if:
. More than 50% of donors vote
. The total weight of passing votes is greater than weight of failing votes
nodes.name: milestonePassed

typeDescriptions.typeString: struct Fund.Milestones storage ref[] storage ref

nodes.documentation:
@dev checks that the current milestone is failed.
A milestone is failed if:
. Less than 50% of donors vote
. The total weight of failing votes is greater than weight of passing votes
nodes.name: milestoneFailed

typeDescriptions.typeString: struct Fund.Milestones storage ref[] storage ref

nodes.documentation:
@dev checks that the current milestone is failed.
A milestone is failed if:
. Less than 50% of donors vote
. The total weight of failing votes is greater than weight of passing votes
nodes.name: milestonesRemaining

nodes.documentation:
@dev Sets the starting values of owner, totalDonated, totalDonors
and currentMilestoneIndex variables
@dev Fallback function

nodes.name: initializeFund
fundSummary

typeDescriptions.typeString: struct Fund.Milestones storage ref[] storage ref

nodes.name: addMilestone

typeDescriptions.typeString: struct Fund.Milestones storage ref[] storage ref

nodes.name: returnMilestone

typeDescriptions.typeString: struct Fund.Milestones storage ref[] storage ref

nodes.documentation:
@dev Gets the total number of milestones added
@return length The number of milestones for the fund
nodes.name: getMilestonesCount

typeDescriptions.typeString: struct Fund.Milestones storage ref[] storage ref

nodes.documentation: @dev Deploys fund and opens fund up for donations
nodes.name: deployFund

nodes.documentation: @dev Allows a donor to make a donation to the fund
nodes.name: makeDonation

typeDescriptions.typeString: struct Fund.Milestones storage ref[] storage ref
struct Fund.Milestones storage ref[] storage ref

nodes.documentation:
@dev Closes the fund to donations, releases the first installment to
the owner of the fund, and opens up voting on the first milestone.
nodes.name: activateFund

nodes.documentation:
@dev Moves the fund on to the next milestone. When called by the owner,
funds are released to the owner if the donors of the fund vote that
the milestone is met. Once the milestone is met, the voting is open for
the next milestone.
nodes.name: nextMilestone

typeDescriptions.typeString: struct Fund.Milestones storage ref[] storage ref

nodes.name: claimFunds
